department: Depart of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Establish a contract for six (6) LIDAR sensors
description: Purchase six (6) high resolution 128-channel LIDAR sensors for the Transport Canada Department
full_summary:
================
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title

High-Resolution 128-Channel LIDAR Sensor

### Reference Number

WS4279111193-Doc4334682879

### Solicitation Number

WS4279111193

### Submission Closing Date

*Date:* 2024-07-26T14:00:00 (Central Time)
*Note:* Submissions closed on this date.

### Description

Transport Canada requires a contract for the supply and delivery of a high-resolution 128-channel LIDAR sensor for the Transport Canada's Crash Avoidance Research Program in Ottawa, Ontario. The sensor must meet automotive-grade standards.

### Bidding Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ottawa, Ontario

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Dustin Levere
* **Email**: [dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Organization**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

### Documents and Attachments

The RFP document can be accessed through the link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20105965?extsite=MjAxMDU5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20105965?extsite=MjAxMDU5NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Tender Status

This tender is no longer open for submission.

### Additional Information

Following the submission of bids, a debriefing may be requested by bidders. The requesting party should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of the bid solicitation process results. Notes and scores will also be made available, upon request.
